QuestData.Title: Returning the Blade
QuestData.Description:
<This dagger, found buried in the chest of the giant worm Icebreaker, belonged to Saza. It is evident that Saza fought bravely, deeply wounding the monster before her death.
This blade should be brought back to the village to give her clan closure.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring Saza's dagger to the Winterpelt.
